Scan the qr code and download the App

Dear users: 

Thank you for choosing the Bipay service. Before using Bipay (hereinafter referred to as "Bipay" or "this software"), please read the "Bipay Service Agreement" and the related agreements mentioned later, especially Terms such as “Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability” as set forth in this Agreement will be reflected in bold form to ensure that you fully understand the terms of this Agreement and consider risks yourself. 

1. Confirmation and Acceptance of this Agreement

1. By downloading Bipay Software and creating or importing a wallet, you are deemed to have fully read and accepted all the terms of this Agreement. This Agreement is effective immediately and has Binding force. 

2. If you are under the age of 18, or have no civil capacity or limited capacity for civil conduct, use Bipay under the direction of a parent or guardian. 

 II. Definition 1. Bipay: Develop a multi-currency wallet management software based on blockchain technology. 

2. User: 

(1) User must be a natural person with full civil capacity; 

(2) If you are using Bipay for minors under the age of 18, you need to be at your parents. Use Bipay under the guidance of a guardian. Bipay has the right to ask you and your parent or guardian to be responsible for all consequences of using Bipay or restricting civil capacity to engage in transactions beyond the scope of his or her civil rights or capacity. 

3. Create or import a wallet: Refers to the process of using Bipay to confirm the fulfillment of this agreement and to create or import a wallet. 

4. Wallet password: refers to the password that you are prompted by the software operation interface during the process of creating the Bipay wallet. This password is used for payment confirmation. Once lost, you need to reset the new password with the login password. 

5. Private key: consists of 256-bit random characters, which is the core of the user's own and use of digital tokens. 

6. Public key: generated by the private key by means of cryptography, and used to generate the blockchain digital wallet address. The digital wallet address is the public collection address. 

7. Login password: It consists of 18 letters or numbers generated by a random algorithm, which is convenient for users to backup and keep. 

3. Service Content

1. Create or import a wallet. For digital tokens supported by Bipay, you can use Bipay to generate a new wallet or import a compatible wallet generated by other wallet tools in the relevant blockchain system. 

2. Transfer, collection. You can use Bipay's transfer and collection functions to manage digital tokens, that is, use the private key for electronic signature and modify the ledger of the relevant blockchain. Transfer means that the payer uses the blockchain address of the payee to perform the transfer operation, and the actual transfer and collection behaviors occur in the relevant blockchain system (not Bipay). 

3. Quotes view. You can use Bipay to view the digital token exchange rate prices provided. Bipay captures the corresponding digital token exchange rate information and displays it in the market section. 

4. Transaction history. We will copy all or part of your transaction history through the blockchain system. However, the transaction records are subject to the records of the blockchain system. 

5. Suspend service. You know that based on the "irrevocable" nature of the blockchain system transaction, we cannot suspend or cancel the transfer transaction, etc., but under certain circumstances, we can suspend or limit the operation of a user on the Bipay software. 

 IV. Disclaimer

1. Bipay will take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information as far as possible under the current state of the art to avoid disclosure, tampering or damage. The system uses wireless transmission of data, so the privacy and security of data transmission over the wireless network cannot be guaranteed. 

5, Other 

1. If you are a user outside the People's Republic of China, you need to fully understand and comply with all relevant laws, rules and regulations in your jurisdiction and use of the Fusion Services. 

2. If you encounter any problems with the use of personal information during the Bipay service, you can contact us by submitting feedback at Bipay. 

3. Any translation of this policy is provided for convenience only and is not intended to be modified by the terms of this policy. If there is a conflict between the Chinese version and the non-Chinese version of this policy, the Chinese version shall prevail. 

This policy is not exhausted, you must abide by the announcements and related rules that Bipay updates from time to time.
The first open source and open wallet
The same currency cannot be exchanged
The amount of sells cannot be less than the minimum sell amount

The convertibility service is supported by Changelly, and the real time exchange rate depends on the relative price of large transactions at home and abroad. The amount of money earned by the exchange service fluctuates according to the real-time price. Each Changelly exchange will be charged 0.5% of the transaction fee and the miner fee will be supported once the transaction is linked. Please refer to the final amount received.
\ \ \ \ \ \ Bipay is a mobile digital asset wallet， focus on multi-chain multi-currency management，provide users with secure, easy-to-use digital asset management services.
Security warning: private keys are not encrypted and exporting is a risk. Please export carefully. Copy completion is recommended for physical storage and keep in a place only you know
The mnemonic word order is verified correctly. After the wallet is created successfully, the Bipay Wallet will remove the mnemonic word and will not be stored and backed up.
